She thinks I’m an asshole because I googled facts about North Dakota and told her that I needed her to promise me that she didn’t actually believe North Dakota could possibly be not real. After a few minutes of trying to get her to believe in North Dakota (I cant believe I’d ever be in this situation) she finally caved. I’m not totally convinced though.
